item.title: 我从 Side Hustler 到 SaaS 联合创始人的故事：Scrybecast 冒险 🤠

ul.li: 可将您的播客变成富有创意、引人入胜的内容

description.p: 所有这些都具有用户友好的界面，专为那些不是技术天才的人设计。
我们的测试版即将发布，我们邀请您成为第一批体验 Scrybecast 变革性功能的用户。加入我们，向我们提供您的反馈，并成为可以重塑播客格局的产品的一部分。
在此处注册 Scrybecast 测试版，成为第一批体验旨在彻底改变播客世界的工具的人。
让我们一起踏上这场激动人心的冒险，一起谱写播客的未来。
再见
广告 此处

item.title: 低代码如何推动 CPG 行业发展

description.p: 在快节奏的包装消费品 (CPG) 世界中，管理复杂的供应链、优化库存和简化分销一直是挑战。但借助 DronaHQ 的低代码平台，CPG 公司可以释放新的增长和效率机会。观看此视频 https://bit.ly/441xHWa 了解 DronaHQ https://www.dronahq.com/ 使 CPG 企业能够构建可自动化和简化流程的自定义应用程序。从库存管理系统到需求预测工具和现场销售人员自动化，DronaHQ 彻底改变了 CPG 公司的运营方式。听听 Mondelez International 的成功故事，该公司利用 DronaHQ 克服挑战并提高运营效率。
广告 此处

item.title: 您如何知道何时使用无代码工具而不是编码？

description.p: 在您的领域中是否有一个流行的“平台”可以帮助您入门？
description.h2: 有时您的解决方案不需要重新发明。例如，如果您的核心理念是电子商务品牌，请从 Shopify 或其替代品开始。
description.p: 问题 11： 您是想自己构建还是聘请专家以节省时间？
description.h2: 一个优秀的无代码专家不仅是技术人员，而且还具有领域/流程专业知识。如果您正在招聘，请确保提供的产品不限于工具。
description.p: 在评估无代码工具时，您还会提出哪些其他问题？
广告 此处

我已经离开无代码世界几年了，但随着发展速度的加快，我很想重新加入。尽管我正在努力寻找活跃的无代码社区。</​​p >
Discord Indiehackers 聊天
广告 此处

item.title: 我用 bubble 构建了一个无代码的 AI 驱动的智能调度

description.p: 嘿，无代码构建者！ 😄
我一直在为我的时间管理而苦苦挣扎🕒，并且不断地在日程安排上犯错误，错误地计算截止日期，并在完成任务时遇到问题✔️。这就是我决定创建产品的原因：人工智能驱动的时间管理助手 🧠。
我的助手与 Google 日历同步，并根据您的空闲时间、优先级、截止日期以及它们是否为重复性任务来组织您的任务。它创建适合您工作方式的每周计划。
现在，我需要你的帮助来烘烤我的项目！我正在寻求诚实的反馈、建议和任何类型的提示，以使我的 AI 时间管理助手变得更好。
心智网
期待听到您的所有想法！ 💭
干杯！ 🍻
广告 此处

item.title: 插件集成指南

description.p: 你好，我正在构建 Feelback.dev，它允许集成 Like 按钮、表情符号反应，你找到这个页面了吗有用吗？ 小部件和一般发送反馈 表单。通常，将一些 UI 内容添加到您的网站以接收来自用户的信号。 我打算制作一些指南或教程以与网站建设者集成。
希望得到一些关于解释需要多深的指导。
NoCode 用户是否熟悉注入的概念

item.title: My story from solo Side Hustler to SaaS Co-Founder: The Scrybecast adventure 🤠

ul.li: Features to turn your podcast into creative, engaging content

description.p: And all of these with a user-friendly interface, specially designed for those who are not technical geniuses.

Our beta release is right around the corner, and we're inviting you to be among the first users to experience Scrybecast's transformative features. Join us, give us your feedback, and be a part of a product that can reshape the podcasting landscape.
Sign up for the Scrybecast beta here and be among the first to experience a tool designed to revolutionize the podcasting world.
Let's embark on this exciting adventure together, and let's write the future of podcasting.
See you soon
Ads here

item.title: How low code is supercharging CPG industry

description.p: In the fast-paced world of consumer packaged goods (CPG), managing complex supply chains, optimizing inventory, and streamlining distribution are constant challenges. But with DronaHQ's low code platform, CPG companies can unlock new opportunities for growth and efficiency. Watch this video https://bit.ly/441xHWa to discover how DronaHQ https://www.dronahq.com/ empowers CPG businesses to build custom applications that automate and streamline processes. From inventory management systems to demand forecasting tools and field sales force automation, DronaHQ revolutionizes the way CPG companies operate. Hear the success story from Mondelez International, which has leveraged DronaHQ to overcome its challenges and improve operational efficiency.
Ads here

item.title: How do you know when to use a no-code tool instead of coding?

description.p: Is there a popular “platform” in your domain that will help you get started?
description.h2: Sometimes your solution does not need reinventing. For example, if your core idea is an e-commerce brand, start with Shopify or its alternatives.
description.p: Question 11: Do you want to build it yourself or hire an expert to save time?
description.h2: A good no-code expert is not just a technician but also has domain/process expertise. If you are hiring, make sure the offerings are not limited to a tool.
description.p: What other questions do you pose when evaluating no-code tools?
Ads here

item.title: I built an no-code AI powered smart scheduling with bubble

description.p: Hey No-code builders! 😄

I've been struggling with my time management 🕒 and constantly making mistakes in scheduling, wrongly calculating deadlines , and facing issues in completing tasks ✔️. That's why I decided to create a product: An AI-powered time management assistant 🧠.

My assistant syncs with Google Calendar and organizes your tasks based on your free time, priority, deadlines, and whether they are recurring tasks or not. It creates a weekly schedule that fits your work style .
Now, I need your help to roast my project! I'm seeking for honest feedback , suggestions, and any kind of tips you might have to make my AI time management assistant better.
mindgenie.co
Looking forward to hearing all your thoughts! 💭
Cheers! 🍻
Ads here
